Twentieth Television Division of Twentieth Century Fox Nuclear Power Supply Company Ltd Sponsorship required to work in the US Work Experience Sr IT Project Manager CVS Health March 2016 to May 2017 Description The project allows physicians to leverage the Electronic Prior Authorization ePA channel in lieu of calling or faxing in requests It allows CVS Health the ability to automate the workflow required to process PA requests The Center for MedicareMedicaid Services CMS guidelines required CVS to leverage PA procedures This project was initiated to close compliance gaps identified in the previous releases The project had a target of cost savings of over 3miilion over a 5 year period CVS Caremark June 2015 to February 2016 Description The drug questions CVS Health uses are formulated with the vendor and focusses on patient safety The refill of prescriptions almost always require a callback by the Pharmacy Service Rep as the questions presented during the refill process are general in nature covering only 16 drugs over 9 therapies This project seeks to enhance the overall customer experience by increasing the number of questions presented during the refill process increase the number of drugs available for the refill process and reduce the call back by the PSR CVS Specialty February 2015 to May 2015 Description The content on the CVS Specialty website is primarily hard coded Changes to the URL requires an IT project which is expensive and time consuming This project would enable the webpages to be content managed and would allow the business to edit content and modify elements of the designlayout It would also allow the team to conduct test and make real time changes base on results maximize SEO results and refresh outdated content in an ever changing medical environment Sr IT Project Manager CVS Caremark September 2014 to January 2015 is undertaking a project to enhance its portal for a new customer intake Clearstone Solutions This requires enhancements for their members of ClearStone who utilize Caremarkcom related to Preferred Pharmacy display based on their narrow network election Key Responsibilities Create Project Charter Manage the Capitalizing Metrics for the individual projects Lead the Development team of through the entire SDLC Drive projects through the planning development testing and release phases of the project lifecycle Environment CA Clarity HP Quality Center MS Project 2007 SharePoint 2007 Sr IT Project Manager CVS Caremark September 2014 to September 2014 Projects Secure Messaging Campaign Manager 30 Project May 2017 Continuing Description This project continues to extend and enhance the secure messaging platform with the goals of automating clinical and operational campaign to communicate with patients who optin to digital communications Based on a subset of data extracted from the backend systems in CVS Health the project would auto trigger secure and nonsecure messages when a patient meets certain criteria Campaigns will be automatically triggered using if this then that type logic in the Digital experience platform CVS Health platform used to send text messages using the backend data The project will provide savings in excess of a million dollars in operational efficiency and on the clinical side provide a platform of generating revenue in excess of 700 million Sr ecommerce IT Project Manager FTD June 2013 to August 2014 Projects Various Enhancements to Apollo Order Management System FTDCom website Order to Cash Cycle Description Com Apollo FTD has a custom J2EE platform for its end to end ecommerce business The FTDcom website represents the order capture site and Apollo being the order management system The products go through a quarterly release cycle for all
